publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: be a disputer/sophist

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngsūn Lóng was a disputer from the Six States Period.

sense.def: The states 齊、楚、燕、韓、趙、魏 (note the absence of Qin, by which these were annexed in the "unification" of "China"

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngsūn Lóng was a disputer from the Six States Period.

sense.def: during the space of time of N

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngsūn Lóng was a disputer from the Six States Period.

sense.def: the period of the 六國
be intensely worried about, be acutely worried about; find unacceptable
semantics; the relation between words and realities
confusion; mentally chaotic state

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: He found the confusion of relations between words and realities unacceptable.

sense.def: diffuse, confused
talents

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Basing himself on those talents in which he excelled,

sense.def: availing oneself of N (to V)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Basing himself on those talents in which he excelled,

sense.def: excel in, be particularly good at
produce (a theory, a thesis, a text)
essay
theory
keep unchanged, preserve
white glow; whiteness (can be specified) 此白
avail oneself of, use (what is not one's own)
things
opt for, choose (a thing, an abstract thing, or a person for a job), show preferences for
opt for (something abstract like a course of action or a pose to be taken etc)
comparison; taking something as an example or point of comparison

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I have long heard about your high-minded sense of justice

sense.def: sense of justice, righteousness

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I have heard forever about your high-minded sense of justice

sense.def: you, master

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I have heard forever about your high-minded sense of justice

sense.def: for a long time; as always

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and I have long hoped to become your disciple.

sense.def: your disciple

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and I have long hoped to become your disciple.

sense.def: for a long time 甚久

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and I have long hoped to become your disciple.

sense.def: become (ruler, one's own enemy etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and I have long hoped to become your disciple.

sense.def: hope that; wish one could; wish one could have; aspire to; would like to

seg.line: 但不取先生以白馬為非馬耳。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 但不取先生以白馬為非馬耳。

sense.def: the only thing is > however

tls:text.tls:srcline: 但不取先生以白馬為非馬耳。

sense.def: agree with the proposition that S

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I beg you to discard this proposition,

sense.def: doctrine

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I beg you to discard this proposition,

sense.def: request a contextually determinate person to do something

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I beg you to discard this proposition,

sense.def: get rid of, discard; dispense with (often with abstract objects)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I beg you to discard this proposition,

sense.def: doctrines, philosophy

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and went on to shoot a dragon and a rhinoceros in Yúnmèng Park.

sense.def: perhaps rhinoceros-like wild animal only tentatively identified by biologists, wild buffalo or ox of some kind, commonly mentioned and hunted already in OBI

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and went on to shoot a dragon and a rhinoceros in Yúnmèng Park,

sense.def: aim arrow at (without necessarily shooting it off); shoot at with arrows

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and went on to shoot a dragon and a rhinoceros in Yúnmèng Park,

sense.def: kill with an arrow

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and went on to shoot a dragon and a rhinoceros in Yúnmèng Park,

sense.def: garden, typically gardened by a gardener, not necessarily with a fence

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and went on to shoot a dragon and a rhinoceros in Yúnmèng Park,

sense.def: 彭蠡之川 "the river Pengli" the N2 constituted by/that is none other than N1

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: "Don't!

sense.def: do not do the contextually determinate thing

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: The King of Chǔ has lost the bow

sense.def: HF: misplace and lose (one's ceremonial cap); lose through inadvertency; Jia Yi, zhiance: show indifference to (ritual and righteousless); leave lying around for others to pick up

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: The King of Chǔ has lost the bow

sense.def: bow

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and a man of Chǔ will find it.

sense.def: find

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Why go ahead and look for it?"

sense.def: why go on to? (expected answer: there is no reason to go on to...)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Why go ahead and look for it?"

sense.def: seek for (a contextually determinate object)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: "The King of Chu was possessed of human-heartedness and righteousness, but he is not quite accomplished.

sense.def: be morally principled and kindly

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: "The King of Chu was possessed of human-heartedness and righteousness, but he is not quite accomplished.

sense.def: not quite; not really

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: "The King of Chu was possessed of human-heartedness and righteousness, but he is not quite accomplished.

sense.def: be fully accomplished; have fully realised one's purpose

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: No need for any Chǔ."

sense.def: definitely need; have any real need for
opt for (something abstract like a course of action or a pose to be taken etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and you disagree with the intellectual choices of Confucius.

sense.def: make an intellectual choice for; opt for (something abstract like a course of action or a pose to be taken etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and you disagree with the intellectual choices of Confucius.

sense.def: regard as wrong, disagree with

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and you disagree with the intellectual choices of Confucius.

sense.def: regard as wrong, disagree with

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: You cultivate the doctrines of the Confucians

sense.def: cultivate (one's person, the ancients etc); apply oneself to; train and exercise (troops); occasionally also with negative objects: LH 2 修詐 "cultivate fraudulence"

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: You cultivate the doctrines of the Confucians

sense.def: the Confucians

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: You cultivate the doctrines of the Confucians

sense.def: doctrine

seg.line: 而非龍異白馬於所謂馬，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而非龍異白馬於所謂馬，

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: but to disapporve of me distinguishing between "a white horse" and what is called "a horse"

sense.def: distinguish (properly) N1 from N2

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而非龍異白馬於所謂馬，

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: but to disapporve of me distinguishing between "a white horse" and what is called "a horse"

sense.def: regard as wrong, disagree with

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Confucius maintained a distinction between "a man of Chǔ" and what is called "a man".

sense.def: distinguish (properly) N1 from N2

seg.line: 夫是仲尼異楚人於所謂人，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 夫是仲尼異楚人於所謂人，

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Now to approve of Confucius distinguishing between "a man of Chǔ" and what is called "a man"

sense.def: distinguish (properly) N1 from N2

tls:text.tls:srcline: 夫是仲尼異楚人於所謂人，

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Now to approve of Confucius distinguishing between "a man of Chǔ" and what is called "a man"

sense.def: declare to be right, consider as right, approve (see also APPROPRIATE)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: whereupon he lost his bow.

sense.def: to lose; lose all control of (one's state)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: whereupon he lost his bow.

sense.def: bow

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: charged it with the Never Return arrow

sense.def: 彭蠡之川 "the river Pengli" the N2 constituted by/that is none other than N1

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: charged it with the Never Return arrow

sense.def: load N1 on the contextually determinate N2

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: charged it with the Never Return arrow

sense.def: SHU: arrow; arrow with wooden shaft and feathers

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I am told that the King of Chǔ stretched the Fǎruò bow

sense.def: 彭蠡之川 "the river Pengli" the N2 constituted by/that is none other than N1

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I am told that the King of Chǔ stretched the Fǎruò bow

sense.def: hear that S

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: is exactly what Confucius maintains.

sense.def: agree with; advocate 不取 "disagree"

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: is exactly what Confucius maintains.

sense.def: be none other than N(PRED)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: that is inconsistent.

sense.def: be contradictory, be absurd

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, when one wishes to take someone as a teacher

sense.def: take on as a teacher; treat as a teacher; revere as one's teacher

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, when one wishes to take someone as a teacher

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Now to teach someone a lesson bofore taking him as a teacher

sense.def: instruct a contextually determinate person

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Now to teach someone a lesson bofore taking him as a teacher

sense.def: take on as a teacher; treat as a teacher; revere as one's teacher

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: this would be a case of first teaching someone a lesson and then taking him as a teacher.

sense.def: take on as a teacher; treat as a teacher; revere as one's teacher

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: this would be a case of first teaching someone a lesson and then taking him as a teacher.

sense.def: first of all

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: this would be a case of first teaching someone a lesson and then taking him as a teacher.

sense.def: at an earlier stage

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Now, if I discard this doctrine

sense.def: supposing as a purely hypothetical and theoretical, or at least remote, possibility

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Now, if I discard this doctrine

sense.def: get rid of, discard; dispense with (often with abstract objects)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Now, if I discard this doctrine

sense.def: now if for example; suppose

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: that is because one's wisdom and learning is less than his.

sense.def: read zhì: intellect; intellectual competence, professional competence; intelligence, intellectual capacity

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: that is because one's wisdom and learning is less than his.

sense.def: learnedness; learning; degree of learnedness

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: that is because one's wisdom and learning is less than his.

sense.def: be inferior the contextually determinate N2 of the contextually determinate N1

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: An attendant asked permission to find the bow,

sense.def: indefinite: a member of his senior group of advisors/ministers

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: An attendant asked permission to find the bow,

sense.def: may I ask (for myself ) to V> please let me [short and idiomatic for 臣請]

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: An attendant asked permission to find the bow,

sense.def: try to find (a concrete physical object)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then I shall beg to become your disciple."

sense.def: become (ruler, one's own enemy etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then I shall beg to become your disciple."

sense.def: your disciple

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then I shall beg to become your disciple."

sense.def: may I ask to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: "Sir, your words are inconsistent.

sense.def: you, master

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: "Sir, your words are inconsistent.

sense.def: be contradictory, be absurd

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: The reason why I count as famous

sense.def: count as famous

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: The reason why I count as famous

sense.def: be considered as N> count as N

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: The reason why I count as famous

sense.def: be famous

seg.line: 龍與孔穿會趙平原君家。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 龍與孔穿會趙平原君家。

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: When Lóng and Kǒng Chuān met in the home of Lord Píngyuán of Zhào

sense.def: (of several subejcts) get together in a meeting; hold a meeting
exert a significant influence on; bring about a transformation; to change profoundly and essentially into something which is active or living, but substantially different; to make comply

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and to transmogrify/teach everyone.

sense.def: all the world> everyone everywhere

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and to transmogrify/teach everyone. [And what follows illustrates how Gong Sunlong moves from 正名to 正名實 so as to avoid incoherence. He is thus NOT proposing what to do. But he is imposing a regime of being consistent and avoiding 誖悖.

sense.def: transform through education/instruction

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: in order to straighten out the relation between names and realities

sense.def: (cause to be correct>) adjust so as to make correct, to correct; ensure the correctness of

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: in order to straighten out (the relation between) names and realities

sense.def: semantics; the relation between words and realities

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngsūn Lóng generalised the argument

sense.def: generalise

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngsūn Lóng wished to further develop this kind of argument

sense.def: generalise

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngsūn Lóng wished to further develop this kind of argument

sense.def: logical disquisitions

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngsūn Lóng wished to further develop this kind of argument

sense.def: this (kind of) Nab

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and if it is not there then in point of fact a white horse is not a horse.

sense.def: in the end, in the event; in point of fact

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and if it is not there then in point of fact a white horse is not a horse.

sense.def: fail to exist, not exist

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then the horse one is seeking is not there,

sense.def: fail to exist, not exist

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then "the horse" one is seeking is not there,

sense.def: fail to exist, not exist

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then "the horse" one is seeking is not there,

sense.def: not exist; be lacking

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: And if it is not appropriate to respond that there is a white horse

sense.def: respond: S; respond that S

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: but there will be a black-colour horse.

sense.def: black

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: If, when you look for a white horse in the stable

sense.def: horse stable; occasionally: fodder house (for horse fodder)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: It is as if, when you look for a white horse in the stable,

sense.def: it is as if S

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: It is as if, when you look for a white horse in the stable,

sense.def: the inside of, in

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: It is as if, when you look for a white horse in the stable,

sense.def: 舞於庭"dance in the court": in; at (a physical location)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then the colour should not follow along.

sense.def: be obliged to; ought to, should fittingly, have a duty to; deserve to be (VERBED); it is right that; shall

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then the colour should not follow along.

sense.def: colour

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then the colour should not be made to follow along (and be undestood).

sense.def: should be V-ed

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then the colour should not be made to follow along (and be understood).

sense.def: figurative: cause to follow long, cause to follow suit

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: when one mentions the shape

sense.def: mention; refer to; speak of

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: when one mentions the shape

sense.def: three-dimensional physical visible shape

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: you wish to study with me, but you try to make me abandon what I teach,

sense.def: desire to, aim to; would like to

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: you wish to study with me, but you try to make me abandon what I teach,

sense.def: study with; become a student of a contextually determinate person

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: you wish to study with me, but you try to make me abandon what I teach,

sense.def: try to cause N to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and in such a way even a hundred (Gōngsūn Lóngs

sense.def: even Mo: 雖我亦將非之。

seg.line: 公孫龍、趙平原君之客也，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 公孫龍、趙平原君之客也，

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngsūn Lóng was a retainer of the Lord Píngyuán of Zhào,

sense.def: guest; guest of honour, principal guest; specifically: invited permanent outside member of the entourage, retainer

tls:text.tls:srcline: 公孫龍、趙平原君之客也，

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngsūn Lóng was a retainer of the Lord Píngyuán of Zhào,

sense.def: retainer of N

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and Kǒng Chuān was a descendant of Confucius.

sense.def: offspring; descendants
(of several subejcts) get together in a meeting; hold a meeting
the study of N

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Please give up the study of the proposition that a white horse is not a horse,

sense.def: get rid of, discard; dispense with (often with abstract objects)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Please give up the study of the proposition that a white horse is not a horse,

sense.def: get rid of, discard; dispense with (often with abstract objects: disavow)

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then I beg to become your disciple."

sense.def: your disciple

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then I beg to become your disciple."

sense.def: 子犯請擊之"Zǐfàn asked to attack them"ask permission (to do what what one would like to do); [The person whose permission is asked should also be in the structure as being always understood. There are quite a number of such cases. CH]

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: then I beg to become your disciple."

sense.def: become (ruler, one's own enemy etc)
the study of the studying person N

seg.line: 無以教而乃學於龍也者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 無以教而乃學於龍也者，

sense.def: marker of topics to be discussed in general abstract terms: as for N as such (Note that the comment is never narrative: one might say that this topic marker, like 夫 has a modal function.)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 無以教而乃學於龍也者，

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and as for studying with me when I have nothing to teach,

sense.def: study (some skill N1) with (a master N2), study ( a subject N1) under (a master N2) 學於孔子

tls:text.tls:srcline: 無以教而乃學於龍也者，

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and as for studying with me when I have nothing to teach,

sense.def: instruct (a person N1) in (a skill N2); instruct; 以仁義教人 occasionally: admonish (someone) about (something)
study (some skill N1) with (a master N2), study ( a subject N1) under (a master N2) 學於孔子
afterwards
resemble
very much, strongly; also: too much, excessively before VP: very; emphatic after VP: enormously, tremendously
like (very much etc)
gentleman with a right to bear a sword and to ride in a carriage; gentleman, member of the gentry. See Yu Yingshi's monograph and Sivin and Lloyd 2002

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: would you be willing to make him your minister?

sense.def: minister of the contextually determinate superordinate person

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: would you be willing to make him your minister?

sense.def: to be willing (to do something one is asked or expected to do but which one has the possibility to refuse to do), be prepared to, agree to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: would you be willing to make him your minister?

sense.def: appoint the contextually determinate N1 as N2
appoint the contextually determinate N1 as N2
will V; is willing to V; have the intention to
=詎 how would he/she/they be an N?

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: does that mean that what you just now called a true intellectual

sense.def: formerly

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Such a person has not quite failed in the four kinds of conduct

sense.def: offend against (rules of behaviour); fail to conform with

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: is not yet to fail in the four kinds of (obligatory) conduct.

sense.def: offend against (rules of behaviour); fail to conform with

sense.def: humiliation

sense.def: be exposed to

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: To be humiliated and not to fight back

sense.def: passivising grammaticalised particle derived from a transitive verb

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: that is a public disgrace.

sense.def: be a shameful public disgrace

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: was humiliated but to the very end did not dare to fight back,

sense.def: a an aggressive public humiliation

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: "Not to fight back when one is bein humiliated

sense.def: =鬥鬬鬭fight back against the contextually determinate N
be intelligent enough to

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: You are intelligent enough to raise objections against the thesis that a white horse is not a horse,

sense.def: raise intellectual objections against

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: is because of my essay on the white horse, that is all.

sense.def: and that is all! 而已

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: will most certainly be incapable of facing up to you."

sense.def: step up to to N so as to face up to

tls:text.tls:line: "Living in Lǔ

sense.def: dwell in for longish time LY 15 居是邦 "when living in such-and-such a state"

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I have heard from my humble sticks,

sense.def: overhear from the sidelines, overhear as an outsider that S

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: I have heard from my humble sticks,

sense.def: from my humble position

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and I have explained your conduct (to others).

sense.def: expound; make explanations, expatiate about things; explain in detail; give a satisfactory explanation ofBUDDH specifically: preach

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and I have explained your conduct (to others).

sense.def: conduct; demeanour, behaviour

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: about your honour's intellectual prowess,

sense.def: wisdom; intellectual prowess. BUDDH: perfect insight, wisdom skr. prajñā

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: but now at last I am getting to meet you.

sense.def: method taught (by a master); teaching

sense.def: for a long time 甚久

sense.def: first now, only now; only these days, only today

sense.def: meet the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: are inconsistent.

sense.def: be contradictory, be inconsistent; be absurd

tls:text.tls:line: then I have nothing to teach

sense.def: have no object to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Thus it is not appropriate to respond that there is a white horse.

sense.def: this being so > thus

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

sense.def: to be proper to V; to be acceptable to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

sense.def: respond: S; respond that S

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: But if deeming it honourable for someone to dare to fight back is right, and if Your Majesty considers it right,

sense.def: (of things) be morally right; be quite appropriate to the occasion

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: But if deeming it honourable for someone to dare to fight back is right, and if Your Majesty considers it as right,

sense.def: approve, consider as right See ASSENT

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: As for "a white horse is to be deemed not to be a horse",

sense.def: quotation marker marking the end of a preceding scope without indicating its beginning

tls:line.title: Translation of 公孫龍子 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Now to combine these two (colour and shape) and to deem them to be a (single) thing

sense.def: combine the contextually determinate Ns

tls:text.tls:line: is wrong.

sense.def: be a logical mistake, be logically wrong

tls:text.tls:line: it is not there,

sense.def: there is not the obligatorily omitted but contextually determinate thing
